actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Authorizing and directing Committee on House Administration to report recommendations to the House to enhance House Chamber security, and for other purposes.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: This resolution authorizes and directs the Committee on House Administration to report recommendations to the House that would enhance chamber security, eliminate lines for entry, allow efficient chamber access, and ensure the ability to maintain social distancing.

titles.title: Authorizing and directing Committee on House Administration to report recommendations to the House to enhance House Chamber security, and for other purposes.
